prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a swirling pattern on its belly.
I want a unique design for a Pokemon that can thrive in both water and land environments.
Generate a blue Pokemon that embodies strength and agility, perfect for aquatic battles.
Make a bipedal Pokemon that has strong arms and a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that can manipulate water currents in its habitat, showcasing powerful limbs.
Design a Pokemon with a distinct round pattern on its body, emphasizing its water-type nature.
Show me a Pokemon that blends features of amphibians and aquatic creatures, emphasizing its fighting style.
